job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Business Administration, Project Management, or a related field. A master’s degree is a plus.

jd: From: Pavankalyan, Atvsllc pavankalyan.p@atvsllc.com Reply to: pavankalyan.p@atvsllc.com JD;Job Title: SAP project manager Location: San Antonio TX -Onsite Job Description: Skills and Qualifications for Project Manager: 1. Educational Background: o bachelor’s degree in information technology, Business Administration, Project Management, or a related field. A master’s degree is a plus. o PMP, PRINCE2, or similar project management certification preferred. 2. Experience: o Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in IT project management, focus on SAP technology implementations. o Proven experience leading at least one full-cycle SAP SuccessFactors implementation. o Experience working with system integrators in a project management capacity highly desirable. o Experience with SAP Activate or other SAP implementation methodologies. o Experience in the public sector or a highly regulated environment a plus. 3. Technical Skills: o In-depth knowledge of SAP SuccessFactors modules, particularly Employee Central, Employee Central Service Center, Work Zone, and Learning Management o Strong understanding of cloud-based ERP solutions and integration with other enterprise systems (e.g., SAP ECC, payroll systems). o Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., Planview PPM Pro, Planview Project Place, Microsoft Project, JIRA, or equivalent). o Proficiency in testing tools (i.e. GitHub, Zephyr, HP Quality Center ) 4. Project Management Skills: o Excellent planning, organizational, and leadership skills, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities. o Strong risk management and problem-solving abilities. o Experience in managing large project budgets and resource allocation. 5. Communication and Interpersonal Skills: o Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. o Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships and influence stakeholders at all levels of the organization. o Ability to facilitate meetings and workshops with diverse stakeholders. 6. Change Management: o Familiarity with Organizational Change Management principles and practices. o Experience in supporting change management efforts during technology implementations. 7. Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills: o Ability to analyze complex problems, identify root causes, and develop effective solutions. o Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality results. 8. Adaptability: o Ability to adapt to changing project requirements and manage ambiguity. o Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
